rows.label: tlk400806_msg0001
rows.name: Oh, yeah! I definitely saw that kid.

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0002
rows.name:
Nimble little blighter he is, though.
Gets away from me every time!
Gahahahah!

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0003
rows.name:
I was just doing my work here,
same as usual, when I heard footsteps
coming from behind me.

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0004
rows.name:
So I turn around, and who do I see but
that boy! I called out to him to stop,
but he ran off even faster than usual.

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0005
rows.name:
If you ask me, that kid's not from
Trigo. Ain't no Trigo kids have
the guts to come all the way out here.

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0006
rows.name:
'Fraid I couldn't tell you where he's
headed, mind. I'm too busy here to be
chasing after kids all day.

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0007
rows.name:
Seeing as you've got Blades
with you, maybe you could try
tracing the boy's tracks?

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0008
rows.name:
It was raining when he ran through
here, so if you follow his tracks,
you might find out where he went.

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0009
rows.name:
Oh, come on, don't tell me
you can't even follow tracks!
Are you Drivers or what?

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0010
rows.name:
With such perfect timing for the rain,
they're bleeding obvious to anyone who
works in the forest like me...

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0011
rows.name:
But I guess you're amateurs when it
comes to forests, so I can't blame you!
Gahahah!

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0012
rows.name:
All right, shall I show you how it's
done? I'd be interested to find out
where that boy's got to, as well.

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0013
rows.name: What should we do?

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0014
rows.name: Ask for help

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0015
rows.name: Figure it out alone

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0016
rows.name: Take a long, good look at the ground.

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0017
rows.name:
Footprints in the wet dirt, pieces of
grass stuck to the ground...

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0018
rows.name:
Look out for anything that seems
unnatural, and if they're spaced evenly,
those'll be the tracks you're after.

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0019
rows.name: What d'you think? You see it now?

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0020
rows.name: You've got guts, I'll give you that.

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0021
rows.name:
But it might not be easy to find
yourselves a Blade who can follow
tracks, you know?

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0022
rows.name:
If you think it'll take too much time,
you can always ask me for help!

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0023
rows.name:
I may be busy, but I can still spare a
few moments to help folk in need
of my skills.

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0024
rows.name:
You see the tracks, right?
Now all you gotta do is follow 'em.

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0025
rows.name:
There's no excuse for thieving from
folk, but I feel like that kid might have
some reason for what he's doing.

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0026
rows.name: Don't be too harsh on him, yeah?
